item.title: Quotes by Carl Sagan
item.description: The nitrogen in our DNA, the calcium in our teeth, the iron in our blood, the carbon in our apple pies were made in the interiors of collapsing stars. We are made of star stuff. We are a way for the cosmos to know itself. — Carl Sagan For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love. — Carl Sagan One glance at a book and you hear the voice of another person, perhaps someone dead for 1,000 years.
